Name: Green Whiskey Smash
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Double old-fashioned glass .
MUDDLE basil in base of shaker.
Add next 3 ingredients (all but sparkling wine) and SHAKE with ice.
TOP with prosecco and briefly stir.
Review: An Irish whiskey Basil Smash invigorated with prosecco.
History: Adapted from a recipe promoted by Jameson for St. Patrick's Day 2025.
